016package de.cuioss.uimodel.model;
017
018import java.io.Serializable;
019
020import lombok.EqualsAndHashCode;
021import lombok.Getter;
022import lombok.ToString;
023
024/**
025 * Provide additional information for integer value
026 *
027 * @author Eugen Fischer
028 */
029@ToString(of = "content", doNotUseGetters = true)
030@EqualsAndHashCode(of = "content", doNotUseGetters = true)
031public class ConditionalInteger implements Serializable {
032
033    private static final int DAX_MAX_BOUND = 32;
034
035    private static final int MONTH_MAX_BOUND = 13;
036
037    private static final int YEAR_MAX_BOUND = 5000;
038
039    private static final int MIN_BOUND = 0;
040
041    /**
042     * Empty instance of {@linkplain ConditionalInteger}
043     */
044    public static final ConditionalInteger EMPTY_INSTANCE = new ConditionalInteger(null, MIN_BOUND, MIN_BOUND);
045
046    private static final long serialVersionUID = 5495286309563797727L;
047
048    @Getter
049    private final Integer content;
050
051    /**
052     * return {@code true} if content is not {@code null} and in bound
053     */
054    @Getter
055    private final boolean validAndInBound;
056
057    /**
058     * ConditionalInteger constructor
059     *
060     * @param content  {@linkplain Integer} could be {@code null}
061     * @param minBound min bound value
062     * @param maxBound max bound value
063     */
064    public ConditionalInteger(final Integer content, final int minBound, final int maxBound) {
065        if (null == content) {
066            this.content = null;
067            validAndInBound = false;
068        } else {
069            this.content = content;
070            final int valueData = content;
071            validAndInBound = valueData > minBound && valueData < maxBound;
072        }
073    }
074
075    /**
076     * Create instance with minBound = 0 and maxBound = 5000
077     *
078     * @param year {@linkplain Integer} could be {@code null}
079     * @return {@linkplain ConditionalInteger}
080     */
081    public static ConditionalInteger createYearInstance(final Integer year) {
082        if (null == year) {
083            return EMPTY_INSTANCE;
084        }
085        return new ConditionalInteger(year, MIN_BOUND, YEAR_MAX_BOUND);
086    }
087
088    /**
089     * Create instance with minBound = 0 and maxBound = 13
090     *
091     * @param month {@linkplain Integer} could be {@code null}
092     * @return {@linkplain ConditionalInteger}
093     */
094    public static ConditionalInteger createMonthInstance(final Integer month) {
095        if (null == month) {
096            return EMPTY_INSTANCE;
097        }
098        return new ConditionalInteger(month, MIN_BOUND, MONTH_MAX_BOUND);
099    }
100
101    /**
102     * Create instance with minBound = 0 and maxBound = 32
103     *
104     * @param day {@linkplain Integer} could be {@code null}
105     * @return {@linkplain ConditionalInteger}
106     */
107    public static ConditionalInteger createDayInstance(final Integer day) {
108        if (null == day) {
109            return EMPTY_INSTANCE;
110        }
111        return new ConditionalInteger(day, MIN_BOUND, DAX_MAX_BOUND);
112    }
113}
